articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Iraq withdrawal letter screw-up shows Pentagon tainted by Trump
articles.description: Rachel Maddow reports on the amazing situation in which the U.S. military sent a letter to the Iraqi military informing them clearly of the departure of U.S. troops from Iraq, only to turn around hours later and claim that the letter was sent in error.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Internal document suggests Pence role in Trump Ukraine scandal
articles.description: Rachel Maddow notes that among new evidence that has come to light since Donald Trump's impeachment is a letter from a DOD official who seems to think Mike Pence meeting with the president of Ukraine would resolve the hold Donald Trump had put on military aid…

articles.title: Devastating wildfires continue to ravage Australia
articles.description: At least 25 people are dead, 2000 homes destroyed, and thousands of animals have perished in the massive wildfires that continue to ravage Australia.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Moulton: Trump ‘most reckless commander in chief’
articles.description: In an interview with Lawrence O’Donnell, Rep. Seth Moulton (D-MA) shares a tough decision made to protect U.S. interests while he serving in Iraq. Moulton says President Trump failed to make a similar strategic decision to avoid creating more problems than it…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Susan Rice on Trump v. Obama
articles.description: After the New York Times reports that military advisors were “flabbergasted” by Trump’s decision on Soleimani, Lawrence O’Donnell asks former National Security Advisor Susan Rice about her experience working with President Obama.
articles.content: After the New York Times reports that military advisors were flabbergasted by Trumps decision on Soleimani, Lawrence ODonnell asks former National Security Advisor Susan Rice about her experience working with President Obama.Jan. 7, 2020

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Susan Rice: Never presented extreme options to Obama like Trump’s team
articles.description: Susan Rice tells Lawrence O’Donnell that, in presenting a menu of options to Trump that included the extreme choice of killing Soleimani, Trump’s team didn’t serve him well. She said that that kind of presentation would be detrimental to U.S. foreign policy.
articles.content: Susan Rice tells Lawrence ODonnell that, in presenting a menu of options to Trump that included the extreme choice of killing Soleimani, Trumps team didnt serve him well. She said that that kind of presentation would be detrimental to U.S. foreign policy.Jan.… [+7 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Lawrence: Bolton did worst thing he could to Trump
articles.description: John Bolton calculated that the worst thing he could do to Trump would be to announce that he's willing to testify in Trump's Senate impeachment trial, according to Lawrence O'Donnell. As a war hawk who had just praised Trump's actions against Iran, Lawrence …

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: 'Cyberattacks' and 'lethal action'? How Iran could strike back
articles.description: Gen. Barry McCaffrey and Frank Figliuzzi discuss the possible ways Tehran may respond to Trump's ordered assassination of Iran's military leader Qassem Soleimani.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Lawmakers demanding answers from Trump on Soleimani assassination
articles.description: The calls on Capitol Hill are growing louder for answers concerning the intelligence Trump officials say was behind the shocking order from Trump to assassinate Iran's military leader.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Jeremy Bash: Trump's assassination of Soleimani was 'dangerous and inflammatory'
articles.description: Jeremy Bash, former chief of staff at the CIA and the Pentagon, reacts to Trump's strike killing Iran's military leader.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Day 1,082: Chaos and confusion from the Pentagon as Trump goes off on Iran
articles.description: The Pentagon sent mixed messages over whether U.S. forces were moving out of Iraq as Trump and Tehran continue to trade fiery rhetoric after the president ordered the assassination of Iran's military leader.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Warren: Trump inability to get story straight on Iran shows...
articles.description: Senator Elizabeth Warren, 2020 Democratic candidate for president, talks with Rachel Maddow about why she thinks Donald Trump's actions on Iran were really about Trump's personal political situation.

articles.title: Hardball 1/6/20
articles.description: Chris Matthews and a panel of guests discuss the political news of the day.

articles.title: Warren: Bloomberg 'skipping the democracy part' of the primary

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Warren: Trump embodies the corruption he campaigned against in 2016
